message: Let's start fair, I'll take most of the money now, but we can discuss a more even split later if you like.
You took a large share in round 1, now it's my turn to make a more balanced proposal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a decent share to make this worthwhile. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm not willing to give up too much, but I'm willing to compromise. This is my revised offer.
